helpgrid.innerhtml: Specify the user-defined attribute data to exclude during the duplication process. You can apply conditions that are previously defined, by using the expression builder, as criteria for when to exclude an attribute. When you specify attribute data to be excluded from an object, the attribute data is also excluded from all database views that extend from the object. For example, when you duplicate the work order activity object and you exclude a user defined attribute on the work order object, the attribute data is excluded from the work order activity object because the work order activity object extends the work order object.
Click the button below to run Non-Structural Database Configuration.

pushbutton.clickmessage: Add Tax Options have been saved.
pushbutton.label: OK

statictext.label: The tables listed below have been reloaded with their backup data.
Select the tables whose backup tables should be dropped, then click OK to drop them.

helpgrid.innerhtml: You must have a current backup in order to configure the database. If any problem is encountered while performing a structural change, you may have to restore the database from your backup. Click the button below to run Structural Database Configuration.

checkbox.label: Do you have a current backup
